name: macOS VM
description: This script creates a macOS Virtual Machine on Proxmox VE using the OpenCore bootloader. It auto-detects Intel/AMD CPUs, downloads a recovery image directly from Apple, builds a GPT-formatted OpenCore boot disk with all required kexts and drivers, generates a unique SMBIOS identity, and configures the VM with macOS-compatible hardware settings. Features a graphical boot picker with Apple icons and auto-boot. Supports macOS Sonoma 14, Sequoia 15, and Tahoe 26.

notes.text: Supports Intel and AMD CPUs. CPU vendor is auto-detected.
The installer auto-boots after 15 seconds with an Apple logo boot screen.
Use Disk Utility to erase the SATA disk as APFS before installing macOS.
